title: Game Character British Female Detective
description: Upgrade your game's audio experience with Game Character British Female Detective.
longDescription:
Audio demo


Immerse your mystery and noir games in the captivating voice of our Game Character British Female Detective Voice Sound Effects Pack. With over 13 minutes of meticulously crafted audio, this collection boasts 593 female voice-over files, totaling 713 MB of optimized voice samples in 24bit/96k.wav format. Perfect for developers working on mystery, noir, hidden object games, visual novels, and more, this pack offers a versatile voice profile that adds depth and authenticity to any project. And with its clean audio format, it's ready for customization and integration into your game seamlessly.


  • 593 female voice-over audio files
  • 713 MB of voice samples
  • All in 24bit/96k .wav file format


This comprehensive voiceover sound library has everything you need to bring your game to life. From evocative vocalizations to intense fighting and pain sounds, custom character-specific dialogue lines, and stock NPC interactions, it provides all the immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files necessary to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding gameplay experiences.


The vocal profile of the British female detective is versatile and dynamic, blending modern sophistication with a touch of classic charm. Clean and authentic, her voice is perfect for a wide range of characters, including in-game NPCs, detectives, mystery solvers, and protagonists in hidden object games, visual novels, and noir settings. Whether she's unraveling mysteries or navigating futuristic landscapes, her voice adds depth and authenticity to any project. Additionally, if you want to further enhance her voice with effects, our audio is available in a clean format, ready for your customization. With a diverse range of vocalizations, from everyday speech to specific in-game phrases, she's a valuable asset to any sci-fi game or movie production.


UCS Compliant: All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant and organized into categories, making it easy to navigate. With 593 voice over audio files and 173 custom dialogue lines such as “My Work Here Is Done, Someone Was Here Recently, A Piece Of Paper Is Burnt I Can’t Read What Was Written On It, Maybe I Should Take A Look Around & many more,” this pack has plenty of options to help your game characters come to life.


This voiceover sound effects pack is not only packed with high-quality voice recordings but also includes thought-out, cohesive scripted dialogue and vocalizations to help you build dynamic stories, game trailers, in-game characters, dramatic moments, and much more.


Product details:

  • 593 female voice-over audio files
  • 713 MB of voice samples
  • All in 24bit/96k .wav file format
  • 21+ minutes of game-ready & optimized audio
  • Includes Soundminer Metadata
  • Universal Category System (UCS) compliant
  • 32 Breathing
  • 12 Cough
  • 11 Crying
  • 173 Custom Lines
  • 14 Fighting
  • 10 Jump
  • 14 Laughing
  • 27 Pain
  • 300 Stock Lines
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • All Royalty Free & YouTube friendly
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)


Upgrade your game's audio experience with Game Character British Female Detective. Let your characters come to life with this comprehensive voiceover sound effects library.
